channel.title: Hugo on Gestural Tech in Music

item.title: Leon Theremin
item.description: Instrument: Theremin (1920s) – Leon Theremin created an instrument in the 1920s named after him: the Theremin. The Theremin is an electronic instrument where you donâ€™t touch it at all! By waving your hands near two antennas, one for pitch (how high or low the sound is) and one for volume (how loud or soft), you control the sound.
